sn12.22:1.3: Note how MS attempts to make sense of this sutta by inserting punctuation; a colon or an em-dash after the initial statement. Now, unlike the previous, it inserts quotes here, suggesting that this passage is meant to be a quote; but the quote is closed below on “nirodho hoti”, and there is no ’ti, so this is unjustified.
sn12.22:3.8: Note that these sentences appear in reverse order at AN 7.72
